title: MSBuild server needs to know Client Console configuration
body:
In order to properly wrap console output at Windows Server needs to know Client console abilities and properties.
Such has to be collected at Client and sent to server in `BuildRequest` command.

Required tests:
- Verify logger outputs are same for Server and former executions for basic use cases of standard console, > file.redirect, /flp. 
- Manual
   - Linux redirect
   - Windows replay binlog
